00068 #if defined(__GNUC__) 
00069 #define GCC_CPUID(level, a, b, c, d)            \
00070   __asm__ ("xchgl %%ebx, %1\n"                  \
00071            "cpuid\n"                            \
00072            "xchgl %%ebx, %1"                    \
00073        : "=a" (a), "=r" (b), "=c" (c), "=d" (d) \
00074        : "0" (level))
